## 

```{r}
library(magrittr)
```


## Create or transform variables


```{r}
?dplyr::mutate
```

## Apply a function to each element of a vector

```{r}
?purrr::map_dbl
```

## Arrange rows by variables

```{r}
?dplyr::arrange
```

```{r}
dplyr::arrange(mtcars, cyl, disp)
```

## Select top (or bottom) n rows (by value)

```{r}
?dplyr::top_n
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% dplyr::top_n(-2)
```
